ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A Composite_assembly is a type of
that is made of multiple materials that are bonded together. A Composite_assembly may be made from any combination of materials. A completed Composite_assembly need not be a rigid shape. A Composite_assembly may also be used as a composite part.

specifies a role of the
for the Composite_assembly.

specifies a role of the
for the Composite_assembly. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

A Composite_assembly_sequence_definition is a single unique sequence or layer within a . The sequence or layer contains an unordered bag of one or more constituent parts. When more than one constituent part resides in the same sequence or layer, the constituents must not overlap. If constituents do overlap, they must be put on separate sequence or layers.

specifies a role of the
for the Composite_assembly_sequence_definition. There shall exist one or more
for the Composite_assembly_sequence_definition

ext_description.p:
A Composite_assembly_table is a type of
that provides an ordered list of constituent parts. The ordered list provides basic placement position within the laminate (see
Figure 1 ).

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
specifies a role of the
for the Composite_assembly_table. There shall exist not less than two Composite_assembly_sequence_definitions for the Composite_assembly_table.
A Constituent_part is a type of . A Constituent_part may, but need not be, defined in a component-assembly relationship. A Constituent_part may be a , or a , or a , or a , or a , or a .

an attribute inherited from the
that specifies the composite item.
quantifies the mass of the Constituent_part. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

ext_description.p:
An Edge_zone_shape is a type of
that depicts the outline of a zone or area of a part.
ext_description.note: An Edge_zone_shape might not be a distinguishable physical edge. It could be where a smooth transition in thickness of the part starts or stops.

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
specifies a role of the
for the Edge_zone_shape.

ext_description.p:
A Filament_laminate is a type of
that is a bonded material of two or more bundles of filament construction. The Filament_laminate defines a volume to fill with filament assemblies.
ext_description.note: The shape of a Filament_laminate may be defined by a cross-section and a length.

When a Filament_laminate is made from a , it usually refers to individual tows, yarns, and rovings. These volumes can be as simple as the cross section and length of a radius filler to as complex as a filament wound vessel. Filament_laminates that are made by pulling and forming processes, called pultrusions, may use a tape form of .

The difference between a ply and a Filament_laminate, when referencing a , is that a ply describes a constant thickness area to be filled by a
and a Filament_laminate describes a general volume to be filled by a .

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
specifies the stock
that is used to make the Filament_laminate. The
is in the form of a tow, yarn or roving, and sometimes tape.

specifies a role of the
for the Filament_laminate. The shape specifies the geometry that defines the cross-sectional area of a Filament_laminate. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

A Filament_laminate_shape is a two-dimensional geometric shape representation for the cross-sectional area of a . It is a two-dimensional geometric shape representation for the cross-sectional area of a .
represents the cross-sectional area of a .

A Laminate_table is a type of . A Laminate_table defines the internal constituents or structural makeup of an overall part or a particular zone, area, or point on the part. A Laminate_table may either a
or a .
specifies specifies the orientation direction for the load carrying reinforcements within the Laminate_table.

specifies the opposing
that forms from the physical material being placed on the base_surface. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

specifies a role of the
used to define the lamination or layers. The layers or lamination are defined to start from the surface and to be laminated or layered in the specified direction and order. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
specifies the boundary of the laminate resulting from a sum of the plies in the . The value of this attribute need not be specified.

specifies that the is to be interpreted as left-hand rule. The left-hand rule
Rosettes are to be interpreted according to left hand rule as are all associated ply orientation angles. The value of this attribute need not be specified. If this attribute is not specified then the
Rosettes and associated ply orientation angles are to be interpreted as righ-hand rule.

ext_description.p:
A Part_laminate_table is a type of
that applies to the overall laminate. It is used to provide allocation of each physical constituent through the use of an ordered placement list. A Part_laminate_table may be either a
or a .

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A Percentage_laminate_table is a type of
that defines the percentage of the total thickness within a zone or point that each uniquely oriented constituent stock material makes up.
For a simple laminate just made out of plies (), a Percentage_laminate_table is used to capture the percentages of different fiber orientations within the zone based on the overall thickness of the zone.
An example would be 40% 0 degree fibers, 30% 90 degree fibers, 15% +45 degree fibers, and 15% -45 degree fibers. The sum of the percents (%) have to equal 100.
The sum of
must equal 100.

specifies a role of the
for the Percentage_laminate_table. There shall exist one or more
for the Percentage_laminate_table.

specifies a role of the
for the Percentage_laminate_table.

A Percentage_ply is an idealization of a ply that represents a portion (percentage) of the thickness of a
with a particular fiber orientation (if required) and material type. This represents a way to relate anisotropic material properties to the varied orientations that exist in a composite part. A Percentage_ply always corresponds to the area within the zone of the
of which it is a portion.

specifies a role of the
for the Percentage_ply. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

specifies a role of the
for the Percentage_ply.

specifies a role of the
for the Percentage_ply. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

specifies a role of the
for the Percentage_ply.

ext_description.p:
A Ply is a type of
that defines one of the layers of constant thickness material that make up a composite part. A Ply is a contiguous structure with a defined boundary that is made of one or more
objects (see
Figure 3 ).

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
specifies the
objects that make up the Ply. There shall exist one or more Ply_pieces for the Ply. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
specifies the measure of the thickness that the Ply will contribute to part thickness after curing. The ply_thickness is constant over the whole area of the Ply.
specifies the direction of the reinforcement fibers within a Ply. For materials with multiple orientations of fibers, orientation shall correspond to the warp direction of the material.

specifies the
used to make the Ply.

specifies the
for the Ply. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

specifies the
for the Ply.

ext_description.p:
A Ply_laminate is a type of
that is formed by two or more
objects that mate with each other. The plies have unique orientation and shape within the Ply_laminate.

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
specifies a role of the
for the Ply_laminate. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

specifies a role of the
for the Ply_laminate.
A Ply_laminate_sequence_definition is an illustration of a single unique sequence or layer within a .

specifies the
objects that are laminated at the sequence. There shall exist one or more
for the Ply_laminate_sequence_definition.

ext_description.p:
A Ply_laminate_table is a type of
that provides an ordered list of
objects. The ordered list provides basic placement position within the laminate (see
Figure 5 ).
ext_description.note: The valid components of a Ply_laminate_table are plies only.
The Ply_laminate_table is only valid to describe a .

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
specifies a role of the
for the Ply_laminate_table. There shall not less than two Ply_laminate_sequence_definitions for the Ply_laminate_table.

A Ply_piece is a type of . It is a single portion of a
that may be combined with other ply pieces on the same layer to make up the . A Ply_piece has the same material and orientation direction as defined for the
of which it is a portion.

specifies a role of the
for the Ply_piece. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

specifies whether or not the material warp surface is away from the basis surface, when the value of this attribute is set to true or false respectively. Material warp surface is the side of the material where the majority of the fibers are located.

A Point_zone_shape is a type of
that specifies a point on the surface of a part. It also specifies the singular volume a piercing line would make as it traveled through the part, normal to the part's surface at the point.

specifies the
that defines the position of the local pierced point of the Point_zone_shape.

ext_description.p:
A Processed_core is a type of
that is the central component of a sandwich construction to which faces or skins are attached. The primary structural purpose of Processed_core is the transfer of shear loads between the faces or skins. Processed_core is
that has been machined, formed, stabilized and/or bonded together (see
Figure 6 ). A core may have a potting compound or adhesive applied to it to make it more rigid, or provide solid attachment points or both.

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
specifies a role of the
for the Processed_core. The
identifies the area where the added_material is applied. There shall exist zero or more
for the Processed_core. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
identifies the ribbon direction of the honeycomb core.

specifies the
core that is processed to get the Processed_core configuration. The types of processes include machining, forming, stabilizing, and bonding.

specifies a role of the
that has another process performed on it. There shall exist one or more Processed_cores for the Processed_core. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

specifies a role of the
for the Processed_core. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

specifies the
for the Processed_core.

ext_description.p:
A Smeared_material is a type of
that provides the material properties for an idealized zone or area of a part.
ext_description.note:
A Smeared_material can represent the material properties of a single
by having the
reference one
and set its percent value of that material’s constituent to 100%.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies the thickness or depth of the zone defined by the Smeared_material.

A Surface_with_direction is the specification of a
and a . The
defines the side of the
that is the material side.

specifies the
that is used in the definition.

specifies a role of the
for the Surface_with_direction.

A Thickness_laminate_table is a type of
that is used to capture the ordered list of constituents that make up a zone.

specifies the
that make up the zone. There shall exist not less than two thickness_laminate_table_components for the Thickness_laminate_table.

ext_description.p:
A Zone_structural_makeup is a type of
that describes the structural makeup of a particular zone, area, or point within a laminate. A Zone_structural_makeup may be a
and a , or a
and a , or a
or a
or a .
ext_description.note: A single Zone_structural_makeup could apply to the whole part. This would be the case for a homogeneous structural part or a simple laminate of constant thickness and material constituents.

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
specifies a role of the
for the Zone_structural_makeup. The boundary specifies the shape of the Zone_structural_makeup as a point, one or more unique list of curves, or a face. When the boundary is not defined for an instance of a Zone_structural_makeup, the Zone_structural_makeup applies to the whole part. This would be the case for a homogeneous structural part.

ext_description.p: A Zone_structural_makeup_shape_representation is the shape of a either zone or area of a part.
ext_description.note: The zone can be a point, a specific area, or the entire part.
ext_description.p:
A Zone_structural_makeup_shape_representation may be a
or a .
